== Introduction ==

'''This distro is inactive as of January 2020.'''

nUbuntu is a collection of network and server security testing tools, piled on top of the existing Ubuntu system. While aimed to be mainly a security testing platform, nUbuntu also operates as a desktop environment for the advanced Linux user.

== Contact Information ==
Website: http://www.nubuntu.org/

IRC: #nubuntu @ irc.kaffeinenet.com 

== Audience ==

== Mission ==

== Goals ==
The main goal of nUbuntu is to create a distribution which is derived from the Ubuntu distribution, and add packages related to security testing, and remove unneeded packages, such as Gnome, Openoffice.org, and Evolution.
